meanings.sent1: The soap was spumier than the shampoo.
meanings.sent2: The ocean water looked spumier after the storm.
meanings.sent3: The spumier clouds reminded me of whipped cream.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as spumier as a fizzy soda.
meanings.sent5: The spumier snowflakes fell gently from the sky.

meanings.definition: spumier (someone who makes or sells frothy drinks)
meanings.sent1: The spumier at the cafe always creates the perfect foam.
meanings.sent2: I asked the spumier for an extra shot of espresso in my latte.
meanings.sent3: The spumier joked that he could make a cloud in a cup.
meanings.sent4: She was a spumier, turning milk into art with every pour.
meanings.sent5: The talented spumier crafted a masterpiece of foam on top of my cappuccino.
